summary:
Transformers is a popular media franchise featuring shape-shifting robots from different planets. It all started with toys in 1984, but soon expanded to TV shows, comics, video games, and movies. The story mainly focuses on the good Autobots and the bad Decepticons, who battle each other while transforming into things like cars and animals.

Over the years, there have been many different Transformers stories, with new characters and worlds. The franchise has made a lot of money and is one of the most successful media franchises ever.
title: Transformers
